name: Voleur Solitaire
description:
Controls:
Arrows = Move
Start =  Pause Game
Space = Jump
X= Interact With Objects
Z= Throw Baguettes ( If you had the power up activated)

You can Also Play with an XboxController.

JoyPad= Move
Start =  Pause Game
Y= Jump
A= Interact With Objects
B= Throw Baguettes ( If you had the power up activated)
